data.text:
Bruce Hasselberg is well known as the first spouse of Loni Anderson, an American actress. His ex-wife was best known as Jennifer Marlowe on the CBS sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati (1978-1982).

Bruce married Loni when the actress was still trying to make a name for herself in Hollywood. They married in their twenties in 1964 and divorced just two years later. Was there a specific cause for their separation? Did the ex-couple have any kids?

Check through the articles below to learn everything there is to know about Loni Andersonâs ex-husband Bruce Hasselberg. Letâs get started.

Early Life of Loni Andersonâs First Husband, Bruce Hasselberg

Bruce Hasselberg was born in Minnetonka, Minnesota, to parents in May 1939. In May of 2023, he will turn 84 years old.

In his early years, as an infant, Bruce lived in Baltimore for a period of time due to his fatherâs job. Later, his parents relocated to Minnesota, where the former celebrity spouse spent the majority of his childhood alongside his four-year younger sister Barbara Hasselberg. His sister was formerly Miss Minnesota.

Furthermore, the celebrity ex-husband is of white ethnicity and holds American nationality.

His Educational Background

In terms of schooling, Bruce Hasselberg attended Bloomington High School. Hasselberg continued his education at Minnesota University, where he earned a degree in Sales and Marketing.

Bruce was an athlete at university and ran for student president as well. Aside from being a student, he also worked part-time for the Westy Bend Company, selling cookware door-to-door.

Bruceâs Father Was Bloomingtonâs Mayor

In 1960, his father, Donald Hasselberg, was elected mayor of Bloomington, Minnesota, and his mother, Phyllis M. Hasselberg, was named First Lady of Bloomington.

Bruceâs father, Donald, worked in a variety of positions prior to becoming mayor. He began his career in the social security department in Baltimore, Maryland. Senior Hasselberg later worked for the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) before being inducted into the army.

Hasselbergâs mother, like his father, was a career woman. Letâs take a quick glance at his mother as well.

Phyllis M. Hasselberg, Bruceâs mother

On February 11, 1918, Bruceâs mother, Phyllis Marian Johnson, was born to Harry Johnson and Myrtle Susag. She married Donald at the age of 20, and they lived together for nearly six decades until her death.

In terms of her employment, she first ran a boarding home before working in the Southdale Dayton Music Department. Hasselbergâs mother excelled at tennis and piano. Phyllis is no longer alive in the world as of 2023. She died in December of 2015.

Hasselberg Cos. is owned by Bruce Hasselberg.

Since March 3, 1963, Bruce has been the sole owner and operator of Hasseberg Cos. Bruce worked in a variety of companies in addition to being the owner.

He joined Premiere Realty as a Senior Vice President four years after graduating from the University of Minnesota. Bruce then worked as the Vice President of Real Estate at Space Centre, formerly St Paul Terminal Warehouse Co., from 1974 until 1979.

He also served for almost two decades as the Chief Financial Officer of the Hasselberg business interest at Haslleberg Cos. in San Antonio, Texas. He is now a firm owner and operator.

For two years, Bruce Hasselberg was married to Loni Anderson.

In 1964, the Minnesota native married Loni Anderson. According to reports, the couple met for the first time at the Miss Minnesota pageant. Bruceâs younger sister Barbara, as well as his future wife Anderson, competed in the beauty peasant show. Hasselberg was at the concert with the purpose of motivating his younger sister when he saw Loni and fell in love with her.

He later approached his future wife, and they began dating. Soon after, they married, and within a year, the couple welcomed their beautiful baby girl together. Unfortunately, as time passed, the spark in their marriage began to fade, and they divorced in 1966.

Bruce Hasseberg remarried after his divorce?

Following his divorce from his first wife, the businessman married his second wife, whose name has yet to be revealed. However, a few years later, Bruce went through the separation process again and divorced his second spouse. Bruce Hasselberg walked down the aisle with Barbara Ann Howard for the third time. Bruce was married to his third wife till she died on September 22, 2013.

On the other hand, his ex-wife, Loni, who later became well-known in the film industry, married three times. Following her divorce from Bruce, she married Ross Bickell, followed by actor Burt Reynolds. Bruceâs ex-wife is currently married to her fourth husband, Bob Flick.

Bruce Hasselberg Has A Son.

Hasselberg has a daughter with The Price She Paid actress Deidra Hoffman from his first marriage. She was born in 1965, making her 58 years old in 2023. Hasselbergâs daughter presently resides in Anderson, California, with her husband Chris Hoffman and children McKenzie Hoffman and Megan Hoffman.

Bruce also has a son from his second marriage, James Hasselberg. The Hasselberg company is owned by James.

Similarly, Bruceâs well-known ex-wife is the mother of her son Quinton Anderson Reynolds, whom she adopted with her third husband, Burt Reynolds.

Bruce is on social media.

He also has a Twitter account with 12 followers.

Meanwhile, his well-known ex-wife Loni Anderson is worth $12 million.
